    Power Level

    Power system in which the circuits operate

    • Method Detail

      • clamp

        public static int clamp​(int value)

        Guarantees power level is valid

        Guarantees power level is between the maximum power level defined and the minimum power level defined (inclusive)
        Parameters:
        value - Value of power level to be clamped
        Returns:
        Clamped power level value

      • decrease

        public static int decrease​(int value)

        Decreases power level

        On Redstone mode power level will be decrease by one unit until it reaches minimum power level On Eletric mode power level is lossless, so the value isn't decreased maintaining equal
        Parameters:
        value - Value of power level to be decreased
        Returns:
        New power level

      • isOn

        public static boolean isOn​(int value)

        Returns true if power level is On

        Parameters:
        value - Value to be verified
        Returns:
        True when power != getMin() False otherwise

      • isOff

        public static boolean isOff​(int value)

        Returns true if power level is Off

        Parameters:
        value - Value to be verified
        Returns:
        True when power == getMin() False otherwise

      • differentStates

        public static boolean differentStates​(int a,
                                      int b)

        Compares if a power is On and the other is Off

        Parameters:
        a - Power value 1
        b - Power value 2
        Returns:
        True when a is On and b is Off, or vice-versa

      • normalize

        public static double normalize​(int value)

        Normalizes power level

        Transforms power level into a number between 0 and 1 (inclusive) as long as the value passed is within the power levels admitted
        Parameters:
        value - Value of power level to be normalized
        Returns:
        Normalized power level

      • getMax

        public static int getMax()

        Get maximum power level

        Maximum power level is 15 (0xF)
        Returns:
        Maximum power level

      • getMin

        public static int getMin()

        Get minimum power level

        Minimum power level is 0
        Returns:
        Minimum power level
